page.title: 10HEALTH
page.content: DOCTORS. There is not a doctors surgery in either of the Hanneys. The nearest surgeries are at Wantage or Grove. DENTISTS. There are no dental surgeries in our block and villagers have to travel to Wantage, Grove or Abingdon to see a dentist. HOSPITAL. The nearest hospital for villagers in our block is at Wantage. The Wantage Hostal is a cottage Hospital with a casualty department. The serious accidents have to go to The John Radcliffe Hospital in Oxford. HEALTH VISITORS CLINIC.. On the first Wednesday of the month there is a health visitors clinic held in the village hall. This is for babies and small children.
